evidence.text: are enjoined from: a.  requiring  Community  Care  Alliance,  Pennsylvania  Coalition  Against Domestic Violence, House of Hope Community Development Corporation, Rhode  Island  Coalition  to  End Homelessness, or Virginia Sexual  and  Domestic  Violence  Action Alliance and their members (collectively, “HUD TRO Plaintiffs”) to agree to  the  following  conditions  or  substantially  similar  conditions  as  a  requirement for receiving funding under a Continuums of Care grant or Community Development Block Grant;

extracted.value: Enjoined from requiring entities to agree to specified conditions or substantially similar conditions as a requirement for receiving funding under a Continuums of Care grant or Community Development Block Grant.

evidence.text: are enjoined from: a.   requiring Plaintiffs the Idaho Coalition Against Domestic Violence; Jane Doe Inc., the Massachusetts Coalition Against Sexual Assault and Domestic Violence; and the Oregon Coalition Against Domestic and Sexual Violence (collectively  “HHS  ACF  TRO  Plaintiffs”)  to  agree  to  the  following  condition  or  any  substantially  similar  condition  as  a  requirement  for  receiving funding under a Family Violence Prevention Services Act State Domestic  Violence  Coalition Grant (FVPSA  Coalition  Grant);

extracted.value: Enjoined from requiring entities to agree to specified condition or any substantially similar condition as a requirement for receiving funding under a FVPSA Coalition Grant.

evidence.text: i.  The requirement that the recipient not “use grant funds to promote ‘gender ideology,’ as defined in E.O. 14168, Defending Women from Gender Ideology Extremism and Restoring Biological Truth to the Federal Government”;

extracted.value: Require that the recipient not "use grant funds to promote gender ideology, as defined in E.O. 14168, Defending Women from Gender Ideology Extremism and Restoring Biological Truth to the Federal Government".

evidence.text: ii.  The requirement that the recipient “agrees that its compliance in all respects  with  all  applicable  Federal  anti-discrimination  laws  is  material to the U.S. Government’s payment decisions for purposes of section 3729(b)(4) of title 31, United States Code ”;

extracted.value: Require that the recipient "agrees that its compliance in all respects with all applicable Federal anti-discrimination laws is material to the U.S. Government’s payment decisions for purposes of section 3729(b)(4) of title 31, United States Code".

evidence.text: iii.  The requirement that the recipient “not use any Grant Funds to fund or promote elective abortions, as required by E.O. 14182, Enforcing the Hyde Amendment”;

extracted.value: Require that the recipient not use any Grant Funds to fund or promote elective abortions, as required by E.O. 14182, Enforcing the Hyde Amendment.

evidence.text: iv.  The condition that “the Recipient’s use of funds provided under this Agreement … , and the Recipient’s operation of projects assisted with  Grant  Funds  are  governed  by  …  [a]ll  current  Executive  Orders.”

extracted.value: Require that the Recipient’s use of funds provided under this Agreement …, and the Recipient’s operation of projects assisted with Grant Funds are governed by … all current Executive Orders.

evidence.text: i.  The requirement that recipients must “certify[]” that “[t]hey do not, and will not during the term of this financial assistance award, operate any programs that advance or promote DEI, DEIA, or discriminatory equity ideology in violation of Federal anti-discrimination laws.”

extracted.value: Require that recipients must "certify[]" that "[t]hey do not, and will not during the term of this financial assistance award, operate any programs that advance or promote DEI, DEIA, or discriminatory equity ideology in violation of Federal anti-discrimination laws".
